quote: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score?
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Do you understand what I'm saying?"
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Why is luge a sport? You dress up like a giant sperm and go sledding really fast. That’s hardly athletic. Phallic and sexy, yes. But hardly athletic.
author: Jessica Park

quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Golf is a game whose aim is to hit a very small ball into an ever smaller hole, with weapons singularly ill-designed for the purpose
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: I can’t believe I’ve missed this sport. It’s all about fingering holes and caressing balls.
author: K.A. Mitchell

quote: The minute you hesitate you are in trouble.
author: Steve Waugh

quote: Tennis is the loneliest sport
author: Andre Agassi

quote: Two hours later, a noise resembling a hippo rolling along a corrugated iron roof shook Jane from her doze and Rob bursts through the living room door.
author: Dougie Brimson

quote: You will never get the best out of anyone professionally unless you understand what motivates and makes them tick personally - as a human being
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: In this jersey I promise to play for the logo on the front, not the name on the back
author: Sidney Crosby

quote: Men spend their time in following a ball or a hare; it is the pleasure even of kings.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Angling is a recreation. It’s supposed to be fun.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: There are a million-and-one ways to enjoy a day’s angling. Catching fish is but one of them.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: It is the goings-on between bites that excites the traditional angler as much as when the float goes under.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: Angling is a sport, so sporting ethics should apply.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: Smile, tip your traditional hat, and enjoy your time by the water.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: Walk while you can.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Sweat Is Just Fat Crying
author: bibia.id

quote: Traditional angling is a mindset. So,have you set your mind?
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: there're are some things better than winning, like finishing with pride.
author: Bemy Wells

quote: Godliness should characterize sports
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It's when you're vertical that you leave the other players standing.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Parkour is a Free Running sport... if you can't fight well... parkour is there to safe you.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Truth is a sport, and winner takes it all.
author: Talismanist Giebra

quote: Sports benefit the spectators the least.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: I love the suffering that goes into the sport, to become the best.
author: Tj Eisenhart

quote: Sportsman's Hall offered four sporting events: rat killing by a weasel, rat killing by a dog, rat killing by a man, and dogfighting.
author: Nick Tosches

quote: Champions never sleep, the eternal spirit keep them alert and awake.
author: Amit Ray

quote: It is better to go skiing and think of God, than go to church and think of sport.
author: Fridtjof Nansen

quote: It is not over. Champions extend their limits and make things happen.
author: Amit Ray

quote: It’s an enemy that I can’t allow to wound me a second time. It’s already done enough damage: most of it hidden far from the surface.
author: Andrea Pirlo

quote: A Star is always a star no matter what stage they are on or at
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Acceptance of the danger is of the essence for playing a quality sport.
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: While the truth is putting on its shoes, the lie becomes a champion of a long-distance running.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: A tie is what you get after ice cubes have wrestled with hot water.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: All bodies are different, all bodies have their own individual way of reacting to the work we make them do.
author: Anna Kessel

quote: Love yourself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Running is an effort to escape from comfort zone.
author: Tumpal Sihombing

quote: I’ve tried a number of religions and gurus in my time, including Buddhism, but ultimately they didn’t do as much for my peace of mind as snooker.
author: Ronnie O'Sullivan

quote: Mind sees world from various perspectives when body does long-distance running.
author: Tumpal Sihombing

quote: It does not need to be perfect - or technically correct - to be magic
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Software testing is a sport like hunting, it's bughunting.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: With a good music and a good dance, you enhance your physical, emotional, spiritual and mental well-being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Happiness is a state of mental,physical and spiritual well-being. Think pleasantly,engaged sport and read daily to enhance your well-being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Rest, refreshed and revived your soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You can begin to dream, to love, to dance, to read, to sing, to study, to paint, to teach, to draw, to swim, to exercise, to write….!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Exercise promotes positive self-image and good well-being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: She tangled her words
author: Debbie Okun Hill

quote: People used to recognize it as mood.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Don't expect others to hand success to you. Create it - with heart, energy and enterprise - and you'll make it come true
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: I can only run the rate in which my heart beats.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Exercise daily to keep an active life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Love is a contact sport you were born to win.
author: Suzette R. Hinton

quote: You can be beautiful and young even as you get older. Keep an active life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He had won, easily. This was something else he could do, and do well, and his Dad had been there to witness his success.
author: Michael Braccia

quote: He had won, easily. This was something else he could do, and do well, and his Dad had been there to witness his success.
author: Michael Braccia

quote: Life is an enduring race.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Just like the cast of a great movie and the career of great athletes few success stories are a one man show. Build your team and grow.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: The wild carp is an icon that forges a living connection between the past and the present.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: Unlike sport in business the win-win is the best possible score
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Health is the greatest strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When it comes to carving out a unique niche in the over-congested world of football ‘personalities,’ Jürgen Norbert Klopp has it down.
author: Trevor Downey

quote: Dancing every night enhances a positive energy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Don Alfredo leaves us, but his memory will last forever in our hearts. Legends never die. Thanks for everything Maestro.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: People argue between Pele or Maradona. Di Stéfano is the best, much more complete.
author: Pelé

quote: Don Alfredo, greatest legend of Real Madrid, always with us. I will always remember maestro.
author: Iker Casillas

quote: Every great thing that has been accomplished, and is yet to be accomplished, starts with a dream.
author: Bill Courtney

quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
author: Ronnie Lott

quote: William Tell could take an apple off your head, Taylor could take off a processed pea!
author: Sid Waddell

quote: Life isn’t a sport of instant success and miracle.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: The most complete footballer in the history of the game.
author: Eusébio

quote: So proud to be joining the best team in the world.
author: Michael Owen

quote: Alfredo was the first Galactico. In fact, he was worth any three of them put together.
author: Francisco Gento

quote: A great amongst the greats.
author: Michel Platini

quote: Di Stéfano was one of the greatest footballers ever. He had such great balance.
author: Alex Ferguson

quote: He was simply the most intelligent football player I ever saw. If I had one player to choose, out of all of them, to save my life, he'd be the one.
author: Bobby Charlton

quote: RIP Sir Alfredo Di Stefano. I will never forget each of the shared moments with such a football legend.
author: Sergio Ramos

quote: Alfredo Di Stefano changed the history of this club and he changed the history of football. He has left us, but his legend will live forever.
author: Florentino Pérez

quote: I mean it, guys," I said. "Why don't you play Two Foot Trivia instead? It's just as fun and much safer."
author: James Ponti

quote: To many people chess is an extreme sport. It requires thinking.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: A trophy's value isn't measured by the worth of its metal but by the amount of work that's required to obtain it
author: Johannes Schiefer

quote: If the result is an intention, so what was my intention if I got the injury?
author: G.S. Ether

quote: Running is a mental sport, more than anything else. You're only as good as your training, and your training is only as good as your thinking.
author: Lauren Oliver

quote: Bouldering isn't really a sport. It's a climbing activity with metaphysical, mystical, and philosophical overtones." -John Gill-
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: The Yankees' Facebook page was hacked. The hacker was immediately purchased and signed to a 5 year contract with the Yankees.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: OK, publishing a book and releasing a movie is all very well, but Tottenham beating Man. U. 3-2... priceless.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: Football is the poetry of a motion.
author: Pubudu Lasal Dissanayake

quote: Well, with that filly in my line of vision blushing like a virgin, something in me was bound to stand at attention. And my walking legs were occupied.
author: A.G. Starling

quote: Put your Body First!
author: Catherine Piot

quote: Politics and Sport were invented to give unknowledgeable people an opportunity to share their knowledge.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: To many people chess is an extreme sport. It requires a lot of thinking.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: Today, with the way things are in all circles, in soccer, in society, in politics, where it seems anything goes, a gesture of honesty goes down well.
author: Iván Fernández Anaya

quote: If it's to be, it's up to me!
author: Cecil Martin former NFL player

quote: I was not a doper, I told myself - I just injected myself to recover and needed pills to sleep.
author: David Millar

quote: The best way to win is to play football
author: Josep Guardiola

quote: Of course you prefer Gregory Peck
author: Gerry Wolstenholme

quote: Sport is the only language spoken by all mankind
author: Dr. Dr. Mohammed Abad Al razak
